title: Video Premiere: Robyn Sherwell – Islander
body:
Guernsey singer/songwriter **Robyn Sherwell** continues her ascent with her forthcoming EP release, Islander, through Birdland Records at the end of next month.

Having garnered plaudits for her switch to a more outwardly pop aesthetic on the lead single, she’s also today streaming _Tightropes_, another track lifted from the EP, alongside unveiling the nostalgic visuals for Islander. Playing with the concept of retracing childhood footsteps, it’s simultaneously energetic and elegant, echoing the sentiments of the song itself. There’s a real feeling of the fragility yet freedom of youth Check out the video below, alongside Tightropes, and a host of forthcoming live dates, including an EP launch on 30 March.

Monday 30 March – The Lexington, London (Islander EP launch)  
Saturday 18 April – Are You Listening? Festival, Reading  
Saturday 2 May – Live At Leeds, Leeds  
Friday 24 July – Tramlines Festival, Sheffield  
Saturday 25 July – Deer Shed Festival, Topcliffe, Yorkshire
